entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Environment.SetEnvironmentVariables() creates REG_SZ instead of REG_EXPAND_SZ #89695
  • Feature Request for the necessary features required for the PowerShell Engine to have Mouse Events #89694
  • area-ILVerification and area-Tools-ILVerification #89693
  • ManualResetEventSlim.Set() should throw ObjectDisposedException #89692
  • ILVerify fails assemblies that use Span<T> and stackalloc #89691

Closed

  • Provide a way to delete symbols with native AOT #89686
  • Improving Arm64 Performance in .NET 8.0 #77010
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled exception. System.TypeLoadException with struct #89690
  • [Docs] Image not loading due to asset deletion #89367

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename area-ILVerification to area-Tools-ILVerification #89698
    area-Meta
  • redo props #89696
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Speed up KeyAnalyzer for substring based frozen collections #89689
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Prefer instances instead of using gsharedvt for types inf… #89688
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Merged

  • Delete dead PemEncoding.IsBase64Character method #89697
    area-System.Security
  • Update Workflow instruction for codespace #89368
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2232276 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update gcinfo for arm64 mrs instruction #89678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop using computed RID for RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER property #89598
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #89673
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Gather optimization info through the DAC #89534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix Globalization Invariant string comparisons with ordinal ignore casing #89660
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • File used by another process #33956
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • CreateNewImage task fails - Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers DN8.P6; Required 'Entrypoint' items were not set. #34329
  • .NET6 - MSB4236: The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found #23311
    Discussion

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Containers] validate that the normalized repository name is a meaningful name #34286
    Area-Containers
  • Remove tooltask validation for Entrypoint/EntrypointArgs #34311
    Area-Containers
  • Tool install local command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing local tools #34004
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49739
  • MapFallbackToFile is returning 404 #49738
  • Anchor Links Not Working #49737
  • EndpointRoutingMiddleware request size log names need improvement #49734
  • Provide a way to persist prerendered state when using Blazor server-side rendering #49733
  • Features and documentation to increase Blazor adoption in the face of incumbent javascript frameworks such as React #49731
  • RDF throws exception for handler with struct parameter and filters #49730
    Backlog

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49509
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49719
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Controllers.ControllerFeatureProvider.PopulateFeature: ReflectionTypeLoadException #49736
  • Consider making Antiforgery a middleware #38338
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-run routing for implicit middlewares that require endpoints #49732
    area-security, area-minimal, area-middleware
  • Add Keyed DI support to SignalR #49729
    area-signalr

Updated

  • Fix BindAsync and misc bugs in RDG #49693
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Return LockedOut result from TwoFactorSignInAsync after a failed call #49337
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update DictionaryJumpTable.cs with FrozenDictionary #49714
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2232228 #49575
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Navigation will not re-route to the same route even if querystring is different #16442
  • Android NavigationPage in inconsistent state if Push/Pop operations are performed sometime after app deactivation #16441
  • Shadow Radius on API 33 not fixxed #16440
  • Error "NSInternalInconsistencyException Reason: Invalid update: invalid number of sections" in CollectionView on iOS still not closed #16438
  • Tab doesn't work correctly with CollectionView on Windows platform #16437

Closed

  • SetAppThemeColor for Label or Entry background colours only works on initial state on release builds #16430

PullRequests

Updated

  • [ci] Run Codesign Verification after MSI creation #16423
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16427
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
